parameters.param: $secpasswd = ConvertTo-SecureString "%password%" -AsPlainText -Force $mycreds = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential ("%computername%\jetbrains", $secpasswd) Enter-PSSession -ComputerName "%computername%" -Credential $mycreds -Authentication Negotiate & sqlcmd -S unit-539 -d MySql56 -Q "SET NOCOUNT ON" Write-Host "exit code: $lastexitcode" Exit-PSSession

$secpasswd = ConvertTo-SecureString "%password%" -AsPlainText -Force $mycreds = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential ("%computername%\jetbrains", $secpasswd) $session = New-PSSession -ComputerName "%computername%" -Credential $mycreds -Authentication Negotiate $cmd = "& sqlcmd -S unit-539 -d MySql56 -Q `"SET NOCOUNT ON`"" invoke-command -session $session -scriptblock {cmd.exe /C "$cmd"} invoke-command -session $session -scriptblock {Write-Host "exit code: $lastexitcode"} Exit-PSSession
